That last three from Aari McDonald ties her with Kia Nurse for the most threes in an NCAA DI WBB Tournament with 22 each.

Kia Nurse (UConn), 2017: 22
Aari McDonald (Arizona), 2021: 22
Betsy Harris (Alabama), 1994: 20
Diana Taurasi (UConn), 2003: 20
Maya Moore (UConn), 2010: 20
